title: nambinadu kuTramA
sahitya:
nambinadu kuTramA nAyaDimai nanmai tImai raNDilum un tiruvaDiyai


anupallavi

  ambikE sakala lOka nAyaki arivu vandha nAL mudal annaiyunnai


caraNam    karuNAnidhi enrarumAmarai Agama purANangaL amarar munivargaLum kapaTam
 illAmal bhajikkum aDiyavarum pugazhvadu kETTen kShtamelAm viDiyum enru
 viLaiyADum paruva mudal virumbi ammagO amma enrurugi ADippADi vENDi un tiruvaruLai
